placeholders.exampleFamily: e.g., eine kleine Familie: meine Frau und zwei T√∂chter
placeholders.exampleHobbies: e.g., treibe ich gerne Sport, gehe ins Fitnessstudio...

alerts.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

alerts.fillNameOriginLiving: Please fill in at least Name, Origin, and Living Since fields.

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.text2: All practice materials, questions, and exercises in this app are independently created using AI technology and publicly available free online resources. We use these resources to generate questions that simulate the complexity and format of the real TELC exam.
disclaimer.text3: Completing exercises in this app does not guarantee success or failure in the actual TELC examination. This is a practice and preparation tool only.

home.title: Let's Prepare for the telc Exam Together

descriptions.practice: Practice all exam sections: Reading, Listening, Writing, and Speaking

vocabulary.title: Vocabulary Builder
vocabulary.viewProgressDesc: See your statistics and learning progress
vocabulary.noStudiedWordsDesc: Start studying to build your vocabulary list!
vocabulary.noNewWordsDesc: You've reached your daily limit. Come back tomorrow!
vocabulary.noDueReviewsDesc: No reviews due today. Great job!
vocabulary.errorLoading: Failed to load vocabulary data. Please try again.
vocabulary.signInMessage: Please sign in to use the Vocabulary Builder. This feature requires authentication to save your learning progress, track studied words, and sync across devices.

onboarding.title: Choose Your Learning Pace
onboarding.subtitle: How many new words do you want to learn each day?
onboarding.casualDesc: Perfect for casual learners who want to take it easy
onboarding.beginnerDesc: Great for building a steady vocabulary foundation
onboarding.seriousDesc: Ideal for dedicated learners who want quick progress
onboarding.info: You can always change your pace later in settings. The app uses spaced repetition to help you remember words effectively.

progress.title: Vocabulary Progress
progress.personaDescription: Choose your preferred daily learning pace. You can change this anytime.

vocabulary.forecast: You'll master approximately {{count}} words this month!

descriptions.main: Practice reading comprehension with various text types
descriptions.part2: Multiple choice questions about a text

listening.title: Listening Comprehension
listening.part1Description: You will hear five short dialogues and you should solve five tasks.
listening.part2Description: You will hear a long conversation and you should solve 10 tasks.
listening.part3Description: You will hear five monologues and you should solve five tasks.

writing.title: Written Expression
writing.description: Write a formal or semi-formal email

descriptions.main: Practice oral expression and conversation skills
Practice German grammar with gap-fill exercises

study.title: 150 Grammar Questions
study.description: Master German grammar with 150 practice questions from various topics
study.progressMessage: You have previous progress on question {{current}} of {{total}}. Would you like to continue from where you left off or start over?
study.restartWarning: This will clear your current progress and start from the beginning. Are you sure?
study.allCompleted: You have completed all 150 grammar questions! Would you like to restart or go back?

profile.title: Profile

loginPrompt.benefit3: Save your exam scores and statistics

deleteAccountModal.title: Delete Account
deleteAccountModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. All your progress and data will be permanently deleted within 7 days.
deleteAccountModal.successMessage: Your account deletion request has been received. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted within 7 days.
deleteAccountModal.inProgressMessage: Your account deletion request is already being processed. Your account will be deleted within 7 days from the original request date.
deleteAccountModal.error: Failed to submit deletion request. Please try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.notificationPermissionMessage: We'll send you daily reminders to practice your German. You can change this anytime in settings.
settings.permissionDeniedMessage: To receive notifications, please enable them in your device settings.
settings.permissionError: Unable to request notification permission. Please check your device settings.
settings.saveSettingsError: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
settings.signInToSaveSettings: Sign in to save your notification preferences
settings.attInfo: Control whether apps can track your activity across other companies' apps and websites. When tracking is enabled, we can provide more personalized ads.
settings.attNotAvailableMessage: App Tracking Transparency is only available on iOS 14 and later.
settings.attDescription: Allow tracking to enable personalized ads and improve your experience?
settings.attAlreadyDetermined: Tracking permission is already set to: {{status}}. You can change it in iOS Settings.
settings.attAuthorized: Tracking enabled. Thank you for helping us improve your experience!
settings.attDenied: Tracking disabled. We respect your privacy choice.
settings.attError: Unable to request tracking permission. Please try again.
settings.adConsentDescription: You can review and change your ad preferences at any time. This controls whether you see personalized ads.
settings.adConsentInfo: Control how ads are personalized for you based on your interests and activity.
settings.personalizedAdsEnabled: Your ad preferences have been updated. You'll see personalized ads based on your interests.
settings.adPreferencesUpdated: Your ad preferences have been updated successfully.
settings.adConsentError: Failed to update ad preferences. Please try again.

stats.title: Statistics
stats.subtitle: Detailed view of your progress across all exam sections

review.title: Enjoying the App?
review.message: Your feedback helps us improve and reach more learners like you. Share your experience with a quick rating!

notificationReminder.title: Stay on Track with Daily Reminders
notificationReminder.message: Get a friendly daily notification to help you practice regularly and achieve your German language goals!
notificationReminder.enabledSuccessMessage: Notifications enabled! You'll receive daily reminders at your chosen time.

mockExam.title: Mock Exam
mockExam.importantNoteText: Before starting the exam, we strongly recommend reviewing the exam structure to familiarize yourself with the format and requirements.
mockExam.disclaimerText1: This mock exam gives you a rough assessment of your current knowledge and preparation. However, it is
mockExam.disclaimerText4: The real exam is conducted under controlled conditions and evaluated by certified examiners. Use this mock exam as a practice tool to identify your weaknesses and improve them specifically.
mockExam.speakingNoteText: The oral exam requires human interaction and cannot be simulated in this mock exam. We recommend using the practice area and practicing with a friend, language partner, or tutor.
mockExam.goodLuck: Good luck! Take your time and read all instructions carefully.
mockExam.resumeOrRestart: You have already started a mock exam. Would you like to continue or start a new exam?
mockExam.confirmRestart: Are you sure you want to start a new exam? Your current progress will be deleted.
mockExam.couldNotStartExam: Could not start exam. Please try again.
mockExam.exitExamMessage: Do you really want to exit? Your progress will be saved and you can continue later.
mockExam.finishExamMessage: Are you sure you want to finish the exam? You can review your results afterwards.
mockExam.completeAllSections: Please complete all required sections before finishing the exam.
mockExam.examCompleted: You have completed the mock exam!
mockExam.examResultsNote: ‚ÑπÔ∏è This is a mock exam for practice. Actual exam results may vary. Use these results to identify your strengths and weaknesses.

help.enterInfoPrompt: Please enter your personal information to generate your introduction text.
help.questionsNote: Important: This part of the exam will likely be in a conversation style. You and your partner will take turns asking questions to get to know each other. It's important to practice asking and answering questions.

sections.discussionNote: Use these questions to continue the conversation with your partner, express your opinion, and share your own experiences.

instructions.taskDescription: Your task: Tell your conversation partner about the following text and then discuss the topic.

part4.subtitle: Common phrases that you can use in many situations

b2Structure.title: Oral Exam Structure
b2Structure.menuDescription: Learn about the B2 oral exam structure, parts, and requirements

b2Part1.title: Speaking Part 1: Presentation
b2Part1.menuDescription: Present a topic and discuss it

help.discussionNote: After your presentation, your partner will ask you questions about the topic. Practice answering these types of questions.

b2Part2.title: Speaking Part 2: Discussion
b2Part2.menuDescription: Discuss controversial topics from magazine articles

help.summaryNote: First, summarize the main points of the article briefly. Focus on the key arguments and facts.
help.discussionNote: Discuss the topic with your partner. Bring in your experiences, express your opinion, justify your arguments, and talk about possible solutions.

b2Part3.title: Speaking Part 3: Problem Solving
b2Part3.menuDescription: Plan something together with your partner

help.dialogueNote: Work together with your partner to plan something. Consider what needs to be done, bring in your ideas and suggestions, and respond to your partner's proposals.

progress.loginPrompt: Please login to save and view your progress across all devices
progress.trackingPrompt: Login to sync your progress across all devices and never lose your work
progress.startPracticing: Start practicing to track your progress!

exam.loginToSaveProgress: You need to log in to save your progress

part1.title: Grammar Part 1
part1.subtitle: Fill in the blanks (Grammar)
part1.taskDescription: Read the text and choose the correct answer from the three options for each gap.
part1.incompleteMessage: Please answer all questions before submitting. {{count}} question(s) remaining.

part2.title: Grammar Part 2
part2.subtitle: Fill in the blanks (Lexical)
part2.taskDescription: Read the text and choose the appropriate word from the word bank for each gap.
part2.incompleteMessage: Please answer all questions before submitting. {{count}} gap(s) remaining.

part1.title: Reading Part 1
part1.subtitle: Match headings to texts
part1.taskDescription: Read the following five texts and assign a suitable heading to each text. There are more headings than texts. Each heading can only be used once.
part1.incompleteMessage: Please assign a heading to all texts before continuing.
part1.duplicateAnswersMessage: You have used the same heading for multiple texts. Please check your answers.

part2.title: Reading Part 2
part2.subtitle: Multiple choice questions
part2.taskDescription: Read the following text and answer the questions by selecting the correct answer.
part2.incompleteMessage: Please answer all questions before submitting. {{count}} question(s) remaining.

part3.title: Reading Part 3
part3.subtitle: Match advertisements
part3.taskDescription: Read the advertisements and the situations. Which advertisement fits which situation? There is not a suitable advertisement for every situation.
part3.incompleteMessage: Please answer all situations before submitting. {{count}} situation(s) remaining.

instructions.title: Task:
instructions.description: Read the incoming email and respond to it. Consider the writing points provided.

camera.hint: Take a photo of your handwritten response
